TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program - Season 3 - Alternis Mod Pack!

Articles.Content:
Good-evening ladies and a gentlemen!

My name is Mattin, and I'm here to proudly announce season 3 of Kerbal Space Program on my channel, as after discovering the wonderment and joy of this great games modding community,

I now have yet even more things to try strive for ambitiously and yet inevitably fail to achieve, all in the name of science!

So please pop on by, as any and all feedback is more the welcome, especially when it come to tips/tricks.. Admittedly for how long I've been playing this game, I still make some rather obvious mistakes.

Thanks for watching!

Edited January 17, 2014 by Spartanmattin

Awesome video!

But you may want to fix the typo - Its Alternis, not alernis
Haha, Thanks I didn't notice that, even though I use the correct spelling in description
